dict.acceptation: 好的；优秀的；有益的；漂亮的，健全的；
好处，利益；善良；善行；好人；

sent.orig: Best is the superlative form of good and worst is the superlative form of bad.
sent.trans: “best”是“good”的最高级形式，“worst”是“bad”的最高级形式。

sent.orig: Good has captured the essence of the runaway, but does not pursue its most disturbing consequences.
sent.trans: Good抓住了这场失控的本质，但没有进一步追踪这个事件最让人担忧的后果。

sent.orig: The state of the stream is revealed by the bad, fail, eof, and good operations.
sent.trans: 流的状态由bad、fail、eof和good操作提示。

sent.orig: Good Christian, good parent, good child, good wife, good husband.
sent.trans: 虔诚的基督徒，慈爱的父母，孝顺的儿女，贤良的妻子，尽职的丈夫。

sent.orig: Good habits nurture good characters; good characters mold good fates.
sent.trans: 好习惯育成好品格，好品格塑造好命运。
